actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title 45, United States Code, in order to provide that a State may act in the case of labor disputes involving a railroad industry primarily engaged in intrastate operations.

summary.text: Provides a State is not precluded in the case of labor disputes involving a railroad industry primarily engaged in intrastate operations from invoking its own procedure and remedies for the settlement of such a labor dispute. (Adds 45 U.S.C. 165)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 45, United States Code, in order to provide that a State may act in the case of labor disputes involving a railroad industry primarily engaged in intrastate operations.
